name: Out of Space
description: Strategy co-op multiplayer game about living on a spaceship with your roommates. You'll need to generate resources, take care of a deadly alien infestation, upgrade your appliances and build your own sustainable space home. Living together is never easy, especially when you are in outer space!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1+, macOS 10.11+ Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD Athlom 64 or newer (SSE2 instruction set support) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce series 8000 or newer Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 600 MB available space Additional Notes: Best played with a Controller
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1+, macOS 10.11+ Processor: Intel i5-3300 / AMD FX 8350 (SSE2 instruction set support) Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 580 / AMD HD 7870 or newer Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 600 MB available space Additional Notes: Best played with a Controller
